titles.title: To designate the facility of the Agriculture Research Service of the Department of Agriculture located at State Highway 26 West in Poplarville, Mississippi, as the "Thad Cochran Southern Horticultural Laboratory".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development and Research.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development and Research Discharged.

committee.subcommittee: Conservation, Credit, Rural Development, and Research
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 10/21/2003--Introduced. Designates the facility of the Agriculture Research Service of the Department of Agriculture located at State Highway 26 West in Poplarville, Mississippi, as the Thad Cochran Southern Horticultural Laboratory.
